title: CampusGives Database
text:
A platform for students to give & receive free items

Built by JP Adjadeh

title: CampusGives Database
text:
What is CampusGives?

A student-driven platform for sharing items.

Allows students to list items they no longer need.

Helps students find free items from others.

Make sure your code chunk starts and ends correctly with ```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE} (not a single backtick).

Save the file (Cmd + S).

Click ‚ÄúRender‚Äù in RStudio.

Your slide should now display the table properly (without showing the R code).
